ARABIC: أَفَمَن يَخْلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخْلُقُ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Is He who creates like him who does not create? So will you not pay heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, could one who creates be like one who cannot? Will you not then contemplate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Is then the One Who creates like the one who does not create? Will you not, then, take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Is the One who can create equal to the one who cannot create anything? Why, then, will you not consider?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So will He Who creates ever be like one who does not create? So do you not heed advice?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is then He Who creates the same as one who creates, not Will you not then reflect
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is He then Who creates like him who does not create? Do you not then mind?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Is He who creates as he who does not create? Will you not remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Is He then Who createth as him who createth not? Will ye not then remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Is He, then, who creates like him who does not create? Will you not, then, take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is there one who createth like unto one who createth not? Will ye not then be admonished?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is He who creates like one who does not create? Will you not then take admonition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is then He Who creates like one that creates not? Will ye not receive admonition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is then He, Who creates as one who creates not? Will you not then remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Is He who creates as he who does not create? Will you not remember?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is He who creates like him who does not create? Will you not take a lesson?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:17] Is He then Who creates — namely, God — as he who does not create, namely, idols, so that you associate them with Him in worship? No. Will you not then remember, this, and so become believers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Is He then Who createth) Allah (as him who createth not?) as him who cannot create: i.e. idols. (Will ye not then remember?) will you not take heed in that which Allah has created for you?
